title: Smart Data Models - Point of Interest schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of a Point of Interest

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PointOfInterest

category.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Category of this point of interest

refSeeAlso.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. List of references to one or more related entities

wardId.description: Property. Ward ID of the entity corresponding to this observation

zoneId.description: Property. Zone ID of the entity corresponding to this observation

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

additionalInfoURL.description: Relationship. URL from which additional information of the subject can be obtained

zoneName.description: Property. Zone name of the entity corresponding to this observation

municipalityInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Municipality information corresponding to this observation.

district.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. District name corresponding to this observation.

ulbName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the Urban Local Body corresponding to this observation.

cityID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. City ID corresponding to this observation.

wardID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Ward ID corresponding to this observation.

stateName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the state corresponding to this observation.

cityName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. City name corresponding to this observation

zoneName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Zone name corresponding to this observation.

zoneID.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Zone ID corresponding to this observation.

wardName.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Ward name corresponding to this observation.

wardNum.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ward number corresponding to this observation.

title.description: Property. This property contains a name given to the Point of interest beyond specific name.

relevance.description: Property. Relevance of the point of interest in order to be presented in different zoom levels. 0 is best larger values means lower relevance

priceRange.description: Property. String describing the range of prices of the access to the Point of Interest

capacity.description: Property. The total number of people which can be allocated at the same time

occupancy.description: Property. The count of people in the in the point of Interest. It should be smaller than capacity
